import React from 'react' import style from './DiscriptionPlanet.module.css' export const DiscriptionPlanets = ({planet}) => { const {id, image, name, population, diameter, terrain, climate, surface_water, favorite} = planet; return ( <>
{name}

This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer. This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer.

) }
